references: Related: CF 257624. Repealing: Ord 83959, Ord 79755, Ord 74776, Ord 16046.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to dangerous weapons, regulating the sale, purchase, possession, carrying, and use of such weapons, creating exceptions, providing penalties, and repealing Ordinance 83959, Ordinance 79755, Ordinance 74776, Section 2 of Ordinance 16046 and all other ordinances inconsistent herewith.
